ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews Edward Kroch the Big Apple Mayor!; One Terribly Hot Day Last Summer; Double Scare!; Cracked Look at Flying; Slumming in America; It Came to Pass...; The Dead Fool; More Cracked List of What's Hot and What's Not; One Fine Evening in Manhattan; 21 Dump Street; One-Shots; Examining Those TV Political Ads with the Hidden Camera!; Noid's Raisin Hell!; Cracked Movie VIII; Late One Night in a Large Midwestern Prison; Gold at End of Rainbow
ComicInfo.Summary: Hudd and Dini follow a rainbow to a pot of gold, but the guard is inside the pot.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:42:46. [Issue ID 250603]
